description: Dark-skinned, handsome Lawrence Portland is looking for his twin brother after he goes missing. He heads over to his apartment to look for clues, and ends up finding a number for escort, and beefy cutie Derek Bolt. He’s surprised to find out that his twin is gay, but the only way he can find him is by investigating and recreating everything he did before disappearing, and that includes smashing Derek’s tight hole.
title: Sex Clues Part 1
